Uses of Channel in edu.biu.scapi.comm
 

Classes in edu.biu.scapi.comm that implement Channel
 class AuthenticatedChannel
          This channel ensures UnlimitedTimes security level.
 class ChannelDecorator
          We use the Decorator Pattern in order to add features to the basic Channel.
 class EncryptedChannel
          This channel ensures CPA security level.
 class PlainChannel
           
 class PlainTCPChannel
          This class represents a concrete channel in the Decorator Pattern used to create Channels.

          An application that wants to use the communication layer will call this function in order to prepare for communication after providing the required parameters.

CmtElGamalHashCommitter(Channel channel)

Uses of Channel in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulationROM
 

Methods in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulationROM with parameters of type Channel
 OTROutput OTFullSimROMDDHOnGroupElementReceiver.transfer(Channel channel, OTRInput input)
          Run the transfer phase of the OT protocol.
 OTROutput OTFullSimROMDDHOnByteArrayReceiver.transfer(Channel channel, OTRInput input)
          Run the following part of the protocol: Transfer Phase (with input sigma) SAMPLE a random value r <- {0, . . . , q-1} COMPUTE 4. g = (gSigma)^r 5. h = (hSigma)^r SEND (g,h) to S WAIT for messages (u0,c0) and (u1,c1) from S IF NOT u0, u1 in G, AND c0, c1 are binary strings of the same length REPORT ERROR OUTPUT xSigma = cSigma XOR KDF(|cSigma|,(uSigma)^r)
 void OTFullSimROMDDHOnGroupElementSender.transfer(Channel channel, OTSInput input)
          Runs the transfer phase of the protocol.
 void OTFullSimROMDDHOnByteArraySender.transfer(Channel channel, OTSInput input)
          Runs the transfer phase of the protocol.
